title: LLM Resource Manifest
description: Schema for defining the available LLM resources and their capabilities.

name.description: The unique logical name for this resource (e.g., 'deepseek_chat').

provided_capabilities.description: A list of skills this resource offers.

env_prefix.description: The prefix for environment variables (e.g., 'DEEPSEEK_CHAT' for DEEPSEEK_CHAT_API_URL).
